Package model

Class AccountCollection

java.lang.Object
model.AccountCollection
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class AccountCollection extends Object implements Serializable
This class is used to store UserAccount objects.
See Also:
  • Serialized Form

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    AccountCollection()
    This is the constructor of the class that creates a HashMap that is used to store the accounts.

  • Constructor Details

    • AccountCollection

      public AccountCollection()
      This is the constructor of the class that creates a HashMap that is used to store the accounts.

  • Method Details

    • makeAccount

      public boolean makeAccount(String username, String password)
      This method creates accounts and puts it into the AccountCollection.
      Parameters:
      username - A String that is the username of the account
      password - A String that is the password of the account.
      Returns:
      A boolean that is true if the account was made successfully.

    • login

      public boolean login(String username, String password)
      This method is used when logging in.
      Parameters:
      username - A String which is the username of the user.
      password - A String which is the password of the user.
      Returns:
      A boolean that is true if the account exists in the AccountCollection.

    • getAccount

      public UserAccount getAccount(String username, String password)
      This method is used to get an account out of the account collection.
      Parameters:
      username - A String that is the username of the user.
      password - A String that is the password of the user.
      Returns:
      An UserAccount object.

    • validName

      public boolean validName(String name)
      This method checks if a username is valid.
      Parameters:
      name - A String which is the username of the user.
      Returns:
      A Boolean that is true if the name exists in the AccountCollection.

    • printAllNames

      public void printAllNames()
      This method is used for testing that prints all the usernames in the AccountCollection.
